objects.text: • Energy Efficient • Multiple Wash Cycles • Smart Controls

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Digital Front Load Washer - Modern Laundry Revolution
product_details.description:
• Sleek white design with modern digital display and intuitive controls
• Large capacity front-loading drum for efficient washing
• Multiple wash cycles including Express, Delay, and Temperature control options
• Energy-efficient operation with digital LED display showing remaining time
• Customizable settings with easy-to-use selection dial
• Advanced washing technology with multiple water level options
• Durable construction with reinforced glass door and safety lock
• Digital control panel with clear cycle indicators
• Compact yet spacious design perfect for modern homes
• Anti-vibration system with stabilizing feet for quiet operation
• User-friendly interface with clear program descriptions
• Energy Star compliant for reduced power consumption
• Multiple temperature settings for various fabric types
• Contemporary aesthetic that complements any laundry space

banner_details:
This banner features a clean, professional layout with a central focus on a high-resolution product image (id: `product_image`) of a washing machine. At the top, a prominent headline (id: `heading`) is styled in bold, uppercase white text, designed to immediately grab attention. Positioned below it is a softer subheading (id: `subheading`) in a light blue tone, aiming to convey modern efficiency. The price (id: `price`) is emphasized within a circular gradient badge, creating contrast with the rest of the layout. At the bottom, a features line (id: `description`) lists key product highlights, while a rectangular call-to-action button (ids: `cta_background`, `cta`) prompts user engagement.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: `#0D47A1`
- Sky Blue: `#4FC3F7`
- Light Blue: `#E3F2FD`
- Gradient Mid Tone: `#2196F3`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image of the washing machine features a sleek and modern color palette dominated by clean white (#FFFFFF), classic black (#000000), and metallic gray (#A9A9A9). The front control panel includes a digital blue LED display (#00BFFF), adding a pop of vibrant tech-like energy to the overall design. These colors blend seamlessly to convey sophistication and functionality, while each shade is strategically highlighted — the white body contrasts sharply with the black circular door, drawing focus to the operational core. The subtle chrome texture around the knob adds a hint of elegance, ideal for an advertisement that emphasizes modern living and reliability.
